Paragraph: The high J SC value , along with a moderate fill factor ( FF ) of 45% and a high open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.79 V , yields a power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 4.12% , which is about 37% increase in PCE from a PCDTBT - based reference device.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |

| J SC material (implied, not explicitly stated) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The high J SC value , along with a moderate fill factor ( FF ) of 45% and a high open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.79 V , yields a power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 4.12% , which is about 37% increase in PCE from a PCDTBT - based reference device.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value        |
|----------------------|
| High J SC value      |
| Moderate fill factor (FF) of 45% |
| High open-circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.79 V |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 4.12% |
| About 37% increase in PCE |
| High J SC value is greater than that of PCDTBT-based reference device |
| Moderate fill factor (FF) of 45% is different from that of PCDTBT-based reference device |
| High open-circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.79 V is different from that of PCDTBT-based reference device |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 4.12% is greater than that of PCDTBT-based reference device (implied) |
